Banner.Description: I have 3 years of experience developing systems, interfaces, and technological solutions to make the web a better place. I am dedicated to writing and refactoring clean, reusable, and scalable code in Spring Boot and Angular , applying good practices and development standards.
AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In 3 years of experience I have covered many roles: Backend Developer, Frontend Developer, and Database. I love contributing my knowledge to create new things that help solve problems.
My capabilities also include implementing system improvements, optimizing sites, standardizing patterns, and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I am working on.
I also program things for my personal use, whether for hobby or utility.
Some of the technologies I have trained and worked with include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Fullstack Developer
Description: Design, develop, and maintain RESTful APIs and microservices.
Develop responsive and user-friendly UI components using Angular
The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high-performance, scalable web applications
Write complex SQL queries, stored procedures, and triggers.

FeatureProjects.Title: My Projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Highlighted Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: IHLMS 2.0 : MHADA
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Implemented Spring Boot and Java to optimize backend processes, resulting in faster response times and improved overall system efficiency.Implemented Daily Reports and sent to respective stakeholders.Data migration Oracle to PostgreSql.Document Approve or Reject using ML.Create Dynamic Report Add in System and Generate Excel report with respective filters.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: PMRDA Post Lottery
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Architected the backend infrastructure using the Spring MVC framework, emphasizing scalability and robust functionality to meet the project's requirements.Implemented a PostgreSQL database solution for effective data management, complemented by the utilization of JBOSS server for hosting, ensuring reliable and optimal system performance.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Demand And Assessement
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: The Demand and Assessment Survey System is an interactive web-based application designed to collect survey responses from citizens using a user-friendly interface integrated with Google Maps. The system enables government agencies, municipalities, or private organizations to conduct large-scale surveys, gather insights, and make data-driven decisions.This platform allows citizens to answer predefined survey questions related to infrastructure development, public services, social initiatives, or community projects. Based on their responses, authorities can analyze demand trends and prioritize initiatives accordingly.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Satara And Parijat FCFS
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Developed and implemented a simplified software program automating every step of the housing FCFS process.Integrated PostgreSQL for secure and efficient data management, ensuring data confidentiality. Enhanced system performance by upgrading interfaces and implementing interest calculation functionality for delayed payments.

Contact.Title: Say Hi!
Contact.Content: I will be glad to hear from you if you want to discuss new opportunities. Write to me, and I will respond as soon as I see your message.
